author: Adrian Collins
description:
My first foray in the the off-screen world of Judge Dredd is the absolutely wild and very Anna Smith Spark Anderson Versus Death. I went in expecting a kind of brutal cyberpunk police procedural, landed in the head of a psi-judge, and witnessed the world and everything inside it burn over and over again. And if […]

The post REVIEW: Anderson Versus Death appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Anderson Versus Death
